website_summaries.verdict: The Feiyu G6 is an outstanding option for high-action outdoor shooting due to its ultra-smooth anti-motor torque design, single-handed controls, and rugged construction.
pros: Includes tripod, carrying case, extension rod, and other accessories
cons: This is an all-around good gimbal for cameras, but you’ll have to purchase the mobile device cradling accessory separately

customer_reviews.title: This is a good edition to the Hero model camera for sure .
customer_reviews.text: This is good for extra stability and less need for post work (video software) stabilization. My to observations are: 1. The gimble shakes at the extreme angle of tilting back but for video usage this is fine because at this angle one would have the gimble handle in frame which would be useless to use. 2 The battery cap on bottom should have some type of ridge or leverage for loosening. I almost had to use vice grip pliers to get it off. Just avoid over tightening. The problem is that if you use en extension pole you don't want the bottom of the gimble (battey cap) loose. I would say that he above are not deal breaker complications.
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: New and improved, love it !
customer_reviews.text: Love this stabilizer gimbal! I already had the Feiyu G5, but this G6 I have to say is a bit nicer. Mainly because they reconfigured where they put the motor so it's not in the way. It's tilted now at an angle so you can view much better. It also has a spot on the side where you can attach a holder for your cell phone or microphone on the side. You can use your cell phone as a larger viewfinder. Well made and also come with a nice carrying case. Perfect for the Gopro!
customer_reviews.author: Janice T.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gimbal, especially for heavier smartphone kits
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set, and the gimbal is excellent with the higher payload than most other mobile gimbals. The smartphone clip that came with the product is of nice quality, but I had to replace it with a ulanzi clamp due to my case being a bit more bulky. This gimbal is great if you’re trying to add more peripherals to your phone such as a mic. The tripod base is also a great plus! Make sure you get the right version that has the whole lot (Tripod, extension, and extra battery) As a whole I’m excited about this product!
customer_reviews.author: NA.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work right for me.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the gymbal to keep the image in frame. It's supposed to stabalize pointing at a spot, but moving around and coming back to the same place shows the camera is points off to one side or the other. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Scot

customer_reviews.title: Give the capability to shoot smooth video.
customer_reviews.text: The Feiyu G6 is a good stabilizer for the GoPro hero 6. It gives you the ability to shoot smooth video. I am happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: I liked it except for the battery going dead.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this gimbal a lot. I did return it because for some reason it stopped working. I think in was an issue with the battery. I got a gimbal for another brand to try. I returned that one and I think I will try the Feiyu G6 Plus. Having the tripod attached to the bottom was great for whenever I wanted to set the gimbal down. You are also limited on using the cases that feiyu makes to use on the G6. The G6 Plus has a platform that you can mount all of your own cases. You can also mount other cameras to the G6 Plus.
customer_reviews.author: GoPro Hero 4 Silver user

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Gimbal!
customer_reviews.text: I also have the Ronin M both have their purpose. The G6 has great build quality. I wish it had just little more room in the design for my Sony A6300 it fits but not for the flip out screen. Great gimbal can use an A6300, GoPro, or iPhone with same gimbal.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get it to charge
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this gimbal and figured my video taking vacations were right around the corner. WELL, if only I could get it to charge..............ugh!! I tried everything from multiple usb adapters that I had lying around (making sure each one matched what was required) with no success. The pictures in the manual indicated that there would be a graphic showing the amount of charge until at last and at a full charge the window would be completely blue or green or whatever it was. I never saw anything on the screen and promptly placed the whole mess back into the box and initiated a return to Amazon. Very disappointing.

customer_reviews.text: The advertising was impressive, and YouTube review who tested Feiyu was excellent! Got my 1st i was impressed the way it holds and gimbal locked performance. Used for 5 times and Bam!!!! Unable to adjust and balance. I have requested and relplacement came in. After few months oh used the apps is unresponsive to the gimbal. Unable to execute firmware update and giving errors.

customer_reviews.title: No extension rod
customer_reviews.text: I'm must start by saying that the gimbal is JUST AMAZING, I'm working with a Canon G3X and the results have blown my mind, the only "complain" is that the extension rod wasn't included, instead, they shipped a spare battery, which at the end is way better than the rod as I work outdoors A LOT, so now I can be outside the whole day without worrying about power

product_meta.title: Feiyu G6 Upgraded 3-Axis Splash Proof Handheld Gimbal for Gopro Hero 8/7/6/5/4 Including Adjustable Tripod and Extension Rod
feature_bullets: 【Connect with GoPro hero8】You can watch the video on our product page, which will explain in detail how to connect GoPro8 to G6 via WiFi. In addition, it should be noted that after GoPro 7/6 is connected to the PTZ, you need to click the "PTZ Mode Button", otherwise your GoPro will stay on the connection interface.

【OLED screen】Feiyu G6 action camera stabilizer has an OLED screen on the handle, you can see the specifications of the gimbal and camera, working mode, battery life, Bluetooth connection, etc. from the screen. The 5000 mAH battery can provide complete power for the gimbal and camera, and it also supports charging for sports cameras.
【Extension pole and tripod included】The extension pole and tripod included are our gifts. If you are missing parts, please contact us directly.

【WiFi & Bluetooth dual working mode】Through the WiFi of GoPro HERO6 / HERO5, RX0 camera, connect to G6 to control camera shooting, video recording, and multiple mode settings. You can connect to G6 via the mobile phone APP Feiyu ON Bluetooth at the same time to set multiple operating parameters.
【12 hours running time】 You can use a 12-hour running time large-capacity battery to shoot from sunrise to sunset.
